name: cmem-plugin-auth
summary: Authenticate to services and provide the OAuth2 access token for other tasks.

name: cmem-plugin-csvcombine
summary: Combine CSV files with the same structure to one dataset.

name: cmem-plugin-currencies
summary: Convert prices between currencies.

name: cmem-plugin-graphql
summary: Send queries to a GraphQL endpoint and save the results in a JSON dataset.

name: cmem-plugin-irdi
summary: Create unique International Registration Data Identifier (IRDI).

name: cmem-plugin-jira
summary: Query and extract data from Jira with JQL.

name: cmem-plugin-jq
summary: Process data structures with the jq expression language.

name: cmem-plugin-kafka
summary: Send and receive messages from Apache Kafka.

name: cmem-plugin-kubernetes
summary: Start processes on pods on your kubernetes cluster.

name: cmem-plugin-llm
summary: Interact with Large Language Models (Execute Instructions, Create Embeddings).

name: cmem-plugin-loopwf
summary: Loop over the output of a task and start a sub-workflow for each entity.

name: cmem-plugin-mattermost
summary: Send messages to Mattermost channels and users.

name: cmem-plugin-nextcloud
summary: Extract and process data from your Nextcloud instance.

name: cmem-plugin-number-conversion
summary: Convert numbers between binary, octal, decimal and hexadecimal representation.

name: cmem-plugin-office365
summary: Extract and process data from your Office365 instance.

name: cmem-plugin-parameters
summary: Set or overwrite parameters of a task.

name: cmem-plugin-pdf-extract
summary: Extract text and tables from PDF documents.

name: cmem-plugin-pgvector
summary: Store and search for embedding vectors in a Postgres vector store.

name: cmem-plugin-project-resources
summary: List and upload project resources.

name: cmem-plugin-pyshacl
summary: Validate your Knowledge Graphs based on tests generated from SHACL shapes.

name: cmem-plugin-salesforce
summary: Send or receive data from your organization´s Salesforce account.

name: cmem-plugin-semspect
summary: Update Knowledge Graphs for visualisation in derivo SemSpect RDF.

name: cmem-plugin-shapes
summary: Generate SHACL shapes from an instance data graph.

name: cmem-plugin-splitfile
summary: Split a text file into parts of the same filesize

name: cmem-plugin-ssh
summary: Get files and process output via secure shell protocol.

name: cmem-plugin-ulid
summary: Create Universally Unique Lexicographically Sortable Identifiers (ULID) in transformations.

name: cmem-plugin-uuid
summary: Create universally unique identifiers (UUIDs) versions 1, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 and 8 in transformations.

name: cmem-plugin-validation
summary: Validate graph and data structures.

name: cmem-plugin-yaml
summary: Load and parse YAML documents.
